name: ActiveBleeding
title: Active Bleeding
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent post operative hemorrhaging.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with post operative hemorrhaging.),(Exclusion Criteria: Concepts that do not indicate a post operative hemorrhage.)
